sentence: His ______ makes him stand out in the crowd.
sentence_translation: 他的身高使他在人群中很显眼。

sentence: We need to ______ the amount of plastic we use daily.
sentence_translation: 我们需要减少每天使用的塑料量。

sentence: The new ______ helped her recover quickly from the illness.
sentence_translation: 这种新疗法帮助她从疾病中快速康复。

sentence: Regular exercise can ______ your physical strength.
sentence_translation: 定期锻炼能提高你的体力。

sentence: The doctor prescribed some ______ for his headache.
sentence_translation: 医生为他的头痛开了一些药。

sentence: Scientists will ______ the new material to check its quality.
sentence_translation: 科学家将测试这种新材料以检查其质量。

sentence: Music ______ is helpful for people with anxiety.
sentence_translation: 音乐疗法对焦虑症患者有帮助。

sentence: Please ______ your voice so everyone can hear you.
sentence_translation: 请提高你的声音，让每个人都能听到。

sentence: Spending time with family brings her great ______.
sentence_translation: 和家人在一起给她带来极大的幸福。

sentence: Be careful not to ______ the wet paint on the wall.
sentence_translation: 小心不要碰到墙上未干的油漆。

sentence: Her eyes were filled with ______ when she heard the bad news.
sentence_translation: 听到坏消息时，她的眼里充满了悲伤。

sentence: His heart ______ rapidly when he ran the final lap.
sentence_translation: 跑最后一圈时，他的心跳得很快。

sentence: He couldn't hide his ______ when he saw the broken window.
sentence_translation: 看到破碎的窗户时，他掩饰不住自己的愤怒。

sentence: The cold wind made her ______ all over.
sentence_translation: 寒风使她浑身发抖。

sentence: She felt a sense of ______ at the sight of the dirty room.
sentence_translation: 看到脏乱的房间，她感到一阵厌恶。

sentence: He is good at ______ difficult customers with patience.
sentence_translation: 他善于耐心应对难缠的顾客。

sentence: To my ______, she remembered my birthday after all these years.
sentence_translation: 令我惊讶的是，这么多年后她还记得我的生日。

sentence: Traveling to foreign countries allows you to ______ different cultures.
sentence_translation: 去国外旅行能让你体验不同的文化。

sentence: She will give a ______ on climate change at the conference.
sentence_translation: 她将在会议上做一个关于气候变化的报告。

sentence: The children looked ______ while playing in the park.
sentence_translation: 孩子们在公园里玩耍时看起来很快乐。

sentence: He wiped the ______ from his forehead after working out.
sentence_translation: 锻炼后，他擦去了额头上的汗水。

sentence: She was ______ when her favorite pet passed away.
sentence_translation: 她最喜欢的宠物去世时，她很悲伤。

sentence: ______ ______ can often reveal a person's true feelings.
sentence_translation: 身体动作往往能揭示一个人的真实感受。

sentence: The teacher was ______ because some students didn't finish their homework.
sentence_translation: 老师很生气，因为有些学生没完成作业。

sentence: Waving is a common ______ to say goodbye in many cultures.
sentence_translation: 挥手是许多文化中常见的告别手势。

sentence: The ______ child clung to his mother in the dark.
sentence_translation: 在黑暗中，那个害怕的孩子紧紧抓住妈妈。

sentence: His ______ of his hands showed he was nervous before the interview.
sentence_translation: 面试前，他揉搓双手的动作表明他很紧张。

sentence: She looked ______ when she smelled the spoiled food.
sentence_translation: 闻到变质食物的味道时，她露出了厌恶的表情。

sentence: A ______ ______ is often a sign of confidence.
sentence_translation: 挺直的背部往往是自信的标志。

sentence: Her face turned ______ when she heard the shocking news.
sentence_translation: 听到这个令人震惊的消息时，她的脸变得苍白。

sentence: ______ ______ can sometimes indicate that a person is defensive.
sentence_translation: 交叉的手臂有时表明一个人处于防御状态。

sentence: Hot and cold are ______ temperatures.
sentence_translation: 热和冷是相反的温度。

sentence: He made a ______ ______ to celebrate his success.
sentence_translation: 他做了一个V形手势庆祝自己的成功。

sentence: Maintaining a ______ attitude helps you overcome difficulties.
sentence_translation: 保持积极的态度能帮助你克服困难。

sentence: Climbing this mountain will be a great ______ for us.
sentence_translation: 攀登这座山对我们来说将是一个巨大的挑战。

sentence: Too many ______ thoughts can affect your mental health.
sentence_translation: 太多消极想法会影响你的心理健康。

sentence: Eating healthy food gives you more ______ to work and study.
sentence_translation: 吃健康的食物能给你更多工作和学习的精力。

sentence: Regular ______ exercise is important for keeping fit.
sentence_translation: 定期的体育锻炼对保持健康很重要。

sentence: Plants produce ______ which is essential for human life.
sentence_translation: 植物产生人类生命所必需的氧气。

sentence: She is ______ that she will pass the exam with good grades.
sentence_translation: 她有信心能以好成绩通过考试。

sentence: The model struck a beautiful ______ for the camera.
sentence_translation: 模特为相机摆出了一个优美的姿势。

sentence: She looked ______ after spending a week on vacation.
sentence_translation: 度过一周假期后，她看起来很放松。

sentence: We are still waiting for their ______ to our proposal.
sentence_translation: 我们仍在等待他们对我们提案的回应。

sentence: The little boy was ______ of the barking dog.
sentence_translation: 这个小男孩害怕那只狂吠的狗。

sentence: Too much work ______ can lead to health problems.
sentence_translation: 过多的工作压力会导致健康问题。

sentence: The ______ cat hid under the bed during the thunderstorm.
sentence_translation: 雷暴期间，那只受惊的猫躲在床底下。

sentence: Good ______ while sitting can prevent back pain.
sentence_translation: 坐着时良好的姿势能预防背痛。

sentence: His ______ voice showed how nervous he was during the speech.
sentence_translation: 他颤抖的声音表明他演讲时有多紧张。

sentence: Gentle ______ can comfort a crying child.
sentence_translation: 轻柔的触摸能安慰哭泣的孩子。

sentence: This incident ______ ______ ______ ______ our team.
sentence_translation: 这件事与我们团队无关。

sentence: Constant ______ of the skin may cause irritation.
sentence_translation: 不停地抓挠皮肤可能会引起刺激。

sentence: It's important to learn how to ______ ______ stress in daily life.
sentence_translation: 学会在日常生活中应对压力很重要。

sentence: He stood with ______ ______ ______ while watching the children play.
sentence_translation: 他双手背后站着，看着孩子们玩耍。

sentence: Deep breathing can help you ______ ______ in dangerous situations.
sentence_translation: 深呼吸能帮助你在危险情况下克服恐惧。

sentence: He gave a ______ ______ ______ to show his approval.
sentence_translation: 他竖起大拇指表示赞同。

sentence: She tried hard to ______ ______ of speaking in public.
sentence_translation: 她努力战胜在公众面前讲话的恐惧。

sentence: He made an ______ ______ to indicate that everything was fine.
sentence_translation: 他做了一个OK手势表示一切顺利。

sentence: Many people ______ spiders even though most are harmless.
sentence_translation: 许多人害怕蜘蛛，尽管大多数蜘蛛是无害的。
